channel.title: 602 npcs
channel.description:
Could some one please help me add 602 npc's to a 317 (using 'Project Insanity [re-release]) I'v tried countless times to add it however i doesn't seem to work. If able could you also help me add 602 GFX's and animation.
P.s, If you need anymore infomation then just ask.
Thank you.

item.title: 602 npcs
item.dc:creator: @PriMaL_PvP PriMaL_PvP
item.description:
@PriMaL_PvP wrote:

[quote=“Microsoft1, post:1, topic:402358”]Hello,

Try posting this under “Server Help”.

Adding npc’s has to do with the server not with your client.

Here is a link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,48.0.html

Thank you.[/quote]

Actually He asked For 602 Npcs, That You Can Do Client Side

Read full topic
